Side Effects: It turned my toenail orange. Other than that no other side effects.
Comments: I have applied this product to my large right toe twice a day for 6 months for  a bad toe nail fungus. It is like nail polish and was compounded by our Pharmacy. There is only a tiny bit of fungus left on the very tip of the nail. The next time I cut my nails it will be gone.  The Pharmacist said it would take about 6 months to clear up.
